caption: I accidentally shot this chaotic polymorph potion that was submersed in acid, and it started leaking all over. I had been planning to blow up the bottom of the acid pool to let the acid out, then go get the potion. I ended up doing that anyway, then jumping in the spilled potion.
altText: I accidentally shot this chaotic polymorph potion that was submersed in acid, and it started leaking
